data.title: Actors Born on December 13
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays in film and TV for the 13th of December. Browse actors, actresses and directors that were born on December 13.
data.text:
Joseph Sickman Corsen, Curacao musician, composer and poet, born in Curacao (d. 1911)

Lucien Guitry, French actor (La Dame aux camélias), born in Paris, France (d. 1925)

Edward LeSaint, American actor and director (Modern Times, The Dumb Messenger), born in Cincinnati, Ohio (d. 1940)

Brand Dirck Ochse, Dutch filmmaker and co-founder (Polygoon), born in The Hague, Netherlands (d. 1958)

Drew Pearson, American newscaster (Drew Pearson), born in Evanston, Illinois (d. 1969)

Norman Foster, American actor (Skyscraper Souls), born in Richmond, Indiana (d. 1976)

Jack Gardner, American actor (The Secret Code; Three Russian Girls), born in San Antoni, Texas (d. 1977)

Van Heflin [Emmett Evan Heflin Jr], American stage, screen, and radio actor (Johnny Eager; Shane; Madame Bovary; 3:10 to Yuma), born in Walters, Oklahoma (d. 1971)

Lillian Roth [Rutstein], American singer and actress (Animal Crackers), born in Boston, Massachusetts (d. 1980)

George "Tiger" Haynes, American jazz guitarist (The Three Flames), and stage and screen actor (The Wiz; In the Heat of the Night), born in Frederiksted, St. Croix (d. 1994)

1914 Larry Parks [Samuel Lawrence Parks], American actor (The Jolson Story, Love Is Better Than Ever), born in Olathe, Kansas (d. 1975)

Curd Jürgens [Curt Jurgens], German-born Austrian actor (Enemy Below, Longest Day), born in Solln, Munich, Bavaria, Germany (d. 1982)

Mark Stevens, American actor (Big Town, Martin Kane, Private Eye), born in Cleveland, Ohio (d. 1994)

Dave Street [Patrick Devlin], American actor and singer (Moonrise; I Surrender Dear; Broadway Open House), born in Los Angeles, California (d. 1971)

1917 John Hart, American actor (The Lone Ranger, The Adventures of Captain Africa), born in Los Angeles, California (d. 2009)

Donald "Don" Taylor, American director and actor (Father's Little Dividend; Escape from the Planet of the Apes), born in Freeport, Pennsylvania (d. 1998)

Albert Paulsen, Ecuadorian-American actor (One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich, Doctors' Hospital), born in Guayaquil, Ecuador (d. 2004)

Dick Van Dyke

American Emmy, Tony, and Grammy Award-winning actor, singer, and dancer (The Dick Van Dyke Show - "Rob Petrie": Bye Bye Birdie; Mary Poppins; The Comic; Diagnosis: Murder), born in West Plains, Missouri

Geneviève Page [Bonjean], French actress (Madame Anais-Belle de Jour, Day & the Hour), born in Paris, France

Christopher Plummer

Canadian Emmy, Tony, and Oscar winning actor (Sound of Music; Cyrano; Beginners), born in Toronto, Ontario [1]

Robert Prosky, Polish-American actor and comedian (Christine, Thief), born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania (d. 2008)

Richard Darryl Zanuck, American Academy Award-winning film producer, born in Los Angeles, California (d. 2012)

Rob Houwer, Dutch director and producer and actor (OK, Professor Columbus), born in The Hague, Netherlands

Edith Clever, German actress (Parsifal, L'Adolescente), born in Wuppertal, Germany

1940 Steve Harmon, American actor (Ens Pulver-Mr Roberts), born in Brooklyn, New York

Anouska Hempel, British actress (Tiffany Jones), born in Wellington, New Zealand

1941 John Davidson, American TV host (Hollywood Squares, That's Incredible), born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania

(Margaret) "Marti" Webb, British actress and singer (Evita; Tell Me on a Sunday), born in Hampstead, London

1943 Arturo Ripstein, Mexican film director (El Lugar Sin Limites, Foxtrot), born in Mexico City

1943 Maurice Hines, American tap-dancer, choreographer, actor, and theater director, born in New York City (d. 2023) [1]

Kathy Garver, American actress (Cissy in Family Affair), born in Long Beach, California

Darlene Cates, American actress (What's Eating Gilbert Grape), born in Borger, Texas (d. 2017)

Paula Wilcox, English actress (Man About the House), born in Manchester, Lancashire, England

1949 Robert Lindsey, English actor (My Family, Citizen Smith), born in Ilkeston, England

Heather North, American actress (Barefoot Executive), born in Pasadena, California

1950 Wendie Malick, American actress (Just Shoot Me), born in Buffalo, New York

Sylvester Ritter (Junkyard Dog), American professional wrestler, born in Wadesboro, North Carolina (d. 1998)

Jim Davidson, British stand-up comedian, actor, and TV personality, born in Kidbrooke, England

1953 Karl Howman, British actor (Brush Strokes; EastEnders - "Buster"), born in Woolwich, London, England

John Anderson, American country singer and actor ("I've Got a Feelin'";"Money in the Bank"), born in Apopka, Florida

Gary Davies, British radio disc jockey and television presenter, born in Manchester, England

Steve Buscemi

American actor and filmmaker (Fargo; Boardwalk Empire; 30 Rock), born in New York City

Clark Brandon, American actor (Fast Food), born in New York City

1958 Lynn-Holly Johnson, American actress (Ice Castles), born in Chicago, Illinois

Boris Zhukov [Jim Harrell], American professional wrestler, born in Roanoke, Virginia

1959 John Whitaker, American actor (Family Affair, Snowball Expr), born in Van Nuys, California

1959 Marianne Gravatte, American model and Playboy playmate (Oct, 1982, 1983 Playmate of the Year), born in Hollywood, California

Venkatesh Daggubati, Indian actor (Dharma Chakram; Ganesh), born in Karamchedu, Andhra Pradesh, India

Irene Sáez, Venezuelan beauty queen crowned Miss Universe 1981 and politician, born in Chacao, Miranda, Venezuela

Karen Witter, American actress (Tina on One Life to Live) and Playboy playmate (Mar, 1982), born in Long Beach, California

Don Roff, American writer and filmmaker, born in Walla Walla, Washington

Jamie Foxx

American comedian (In Living Color), Academy Award-winning actor (Ray), and Grammy Award-winning musician ("Blame It"), born in Terrell, Texas

1967 Jenn Thompson, American actor (Dee-Harper Valley PTA), born in New York City

Tony Curran, Scottish actor (Gladiator, Underworld: Evolution), born in Glasgow, Scotland

Jesse Armstrong, British screenwriter and producer (creator of Succession), born in Oswestry, England

Christie Clark, American actress (Carrie Brady-Days of Our Life), born in Los Angeles, California

Chelsea Hertford, American actress (Major Dad)

Emma Corrin, English actor (Princess Diana in The Crown), born in Royal Tunbridge Wells, England
